name: Keep Your Cool
description:
Entry for the 70th TriJam. This game was made in 3 hours. The Theme this week is: Seasons

Disclosure: I used an Artpack for this game.

Used Artpack: https://rottingpixels.itch.io/four-seasons-platformer-tileset-16x16free

Help Frosty to collect four magic potions that will grant him immunity against heat.

The potions are hidden in each of the four seasons. Switch through the seasons to find them all. But be careful, Frosty doesn't survive long in the heat.

The level design is not as good as I had hoped, but i guess three hours is a bit too little to create a good multi-layered level.

Source Code: https://github.com/TLochow/Keep-Your-Cool
